V03bsu058_u:2851: yattu upādhyāyasya anupasaṃpannatve saṃvarasya utthānamuktaṃ saṃghamadhikṛtya etad,
V03bsu058_u:2855: saṃvaramukhatvāt upādhyāyasya tad-pratyācakṣaṇe nāsti saṃvarasya utthānam //
V03bsu058_u:2856: grantho 'tra - upasaṃpadyamānaḥ upādyāyaṃ pratyākhyātaṃ upasaṃpanno vaktavyo 'nupasaṃpanno vaktavyaḥ?
V03bsu058_u:2859: anayoḥ kṣetropādhyāyoḥ samādātrā [karma]kārakeṇa vā nāmānutkīrtane na bhavati saṃvarasya utthānam //
V03bsu058_u:2871: karmakārakaṃ prati ayaṃ granthaḥ - “trayāṇāṃ nāma na parikīrtayati - upādhyāyasya,
V03bsu058_u:2881: yad karmakārakeṇa samādātuḥ tadviṣayatvasya upanīteḥ tadakaraṇam /
V03bsu058_u:2885: yasmāt yatra karmaṇi tatra saṃghasya kartṛtvapratipattiḥ,
V03bsu058_u:2896: ābhyāṃ dhvajābhyāṃ gṛhītābhyāṃ na bhavati saṃvarasyotthānam /
V03bsu058_u:2900: samādānato nagnībhūtasya tīrthikadhvajaḥ iti anenaiva saṃgrahāt /
V03bsu058_u:2911: tasmāt yena nimittena āpattyadarśanādinā - utkṣepaṇīyaṃ karmakṛtaṃ bhavati,
V03bsu058_u:2930: samādātra antarāyikasya 'asti me 'ntarāyikam' iti pratijñāne saṃvarasya dāne duṣkṛtamāṭrakaṃ,
V03bsu058_u:2932: nidāneṣvatra granthaḥ - “antarāyikaiḥ tāvat bhadanta dharmaiḥ samanvāgatam,
V03bsu058_u:2941: etatpradarśanaṃ - vyañjanāntarasya prakāratvāt atrotthānaṃ na syāt /
V03bsu058_u:2946: asya puruṣasya anukṛtitvasya hastacchinnāḥ pādacchinnā ityādinā ākṣiptatvam,
V03bsu058_u:2951: bhikṣavastu upasaṃpādakāḥ āpadyante duṣkṛtāmiti” pāpalakṣaṇe granthaḥ //
V03bsu058_u:2956: saṃsthāna-pramāṇa-daśābhedo manuṣyāṇāṃ yatra dvīpe tanmātravyudāśasavaraṃ atra dvīpagrahaṇaṃ vyavatiṣṭhate /
V03bsu058_u:2958: evaṃ ca ekadvīpakānāmapi eṣa mukha-karṇaprāvaraṇādīnāṃ pratikṣiptatvaṃ veditavyam //
V03bsu058_u:2973: antaḥ kubjo bahīḥ kubjaḥ antarbahiḥ kubja iti,
V03bsu058_u:2995: apāṅgasamīpavarti yo akṣyavayavaḥ sa yasya nāsāsamīpe,
V03bsu058_u:3001: galitapakṣmaromatvāt vigaladraktamāsavat akṣṇaḥ paryanto yasya asau kaśmīlitākṣaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:3002: akṣākṣaḥ iti akṣayoḥ akṣiṇī yasya asau akṣākṣaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:3003: akṣiśāla-śantra dardru-vicarcikā iti akṣiśabdasya pratyekaṃ nipātaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:3014: aṇḍalāṅgulapraticchanna iti aṇḍābhyāṃ lāṅgūlaḥ praticchannaḥ asya iti aṇḍalāṅgūlapraticchanna iti aṇḍābhyāṃ lāṅgūlaḥ praticchannaḥ asya iti aṇḍalāṅgūlapraticchanaḥ //
V03bsu058_u:3016: mūḍha ityanena upasaṃpadaṃ na jānātītyasya saṃgṛhītatvam //
V03bsu058_u:3018: mūkavadhira iti mūkagraḥaṇena satyāṃ jihvāyāṃ vaktumasamarthaḥ jihvāhīnaḥ,
V03bsu058_u:3020: [ekahastapādaḥ iti ekaśabdasya] hastapādaśabdayoḥ pratyekaṃ saṃbandhaḥ - ekahastaḥ,
V03bsu058_u:3025: hasti-aśva-śva-go-meṣa-mṛga-matsya-ahi-dīrgha-bahuśīrṣa iti śīrṣaśabdasya pratyekaṃ abhisaṃbaṃdhaḥ - hastiśīrṣaḥ aśvaśīrṣaḥ,
V03bsu058_u:3034: 'sarvanīlaḥ sarvapītaḥ sarvalohitaḥ sarvāvadāta' iti etadapi yatpaṭhyate,
V03bsu058_u:3043: sarveṇa sarvaṃ yadbhūyasā yasya vā abhiprāṇātipātapravarttā /
V03bsu058_u:3051: asatyapi janakatve mātāpitṛparigraheṇa avasthitayoḥ anujñāne saptāhadhāraṇe saṃghe ca ārocane [mātā-]pitṛtvaṃ,
V03bsu058_u:3058: evaṃ dhītikṛtikā yasya dhītitvaṃ upagatikā” - ityatra granthaḥ //
V03bsu058_u:3074: yad māṭṛghātakādeḥ pravrājanaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ tatra ānantaryakṛtvaṃ tattu pratipattavyam /
V03bsu058_u:3075: ānantaryakārī na pravrājyaḥ ityevaṃ puna stad /
V03bsu058_u:3076: na sarvamātṛghāṭako na pravrājya ityevaṃ ca /
V03bsu058_u:3079: kasmin bhikṣuṇyāṃ kṛte bhikṣuṇīdūṣakatvaṃ jātaṃ bhavati,
V03bsu058_u:3093: no tu sahite pratiyogisvādanena dūṣakatvasya utthānam,
V03bsu058_u:3094: ityasya na hi anya-pradoṣeṇa anyasya saṃbaṃdhaḥ,
V03bsu058_u:3110: nipātane vā āmarṣaṇe vā aparājitatvaṃ bhikṣuṇyā iti hi etad adūṣakatva-vijñānam /
V03bsu058_u:3119: (644) arhatvaṃ pravrajyopasaṃpadoḥ upagatau puṃstvasya hīnāyāṃ yoṣiti //
V03bsu058_u:3120: śikṣāṃ pratyākhyāya hīnāyāṃ vṛttāyāṃ striyāṃ vyaṃjanaparivṛttyā puṃstvogatau arhatvaṃ pravrajyopasaṃpadoḥ /
V03bsu058_u:3123: 'arhatvaṃ pravrajyopasaṃpadoḥ upagatau puṃstvasya hīnāyāṃ yoṣiti' - ityanubandhaḥ //
V03bsu058_u:3125: poṣadhavastu atra granthaḥ - “yaduktaṃ bhagavatā bhikṣuṇī bhiḥ bhikṣūṇāmantike bhikṣuṇībhāvaḥ paryeṣitavyaḥ iti katamesāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ āvāsika-naivāsikānāṃ, upālin“, iti /
V03bsu058_u:3126: tatsthānagatā vāsasthaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ upaniśritya bhikṣuṇīnāṃ vāsaḥ /
V03bsu058_u:3128: na ca niśrayātikramo yuktaḥ ityetad vijñānam /
V03bsu058_u:3133: gṛhyamāṇe saṃvare tasya saṃvarasya yadbhavatvaṃ tasya tadavasthasya utsṛṣṭau pratyākhyānādinā utsarge dhvaṃso bhavati /
V03bsu058_u:3135: na ca āneghasya pratyudāvṛttiḥ laṅghanādau dṛśyate /
V03bsu058_u:3136: tasmāt, na bhavatyasyā 'jāyamānatve saṃvarasya pratyudāvṛttiḥ iti yo manyeta tannābhinivṛttyartha etatsūtram /
